forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. Showers this morning with clearing during the afternoon hours. High 11C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Decreasing cloudiness and windy. High 53F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. WNW winds shifting to SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 46F. WNW winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Higher wind gusts possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Higher wind gusts possible.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 57F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with light rain likely. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of light rain. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 12C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 3C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 39F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 4C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 39F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High around 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
